div.h1: Breakfast and Lunch During the School Closure

div.div: Breakfast and Lunch During the School Closure

p.style: line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); text-align: left;
p.span: Knowing many of our families rely on school meals for their children, we will be offering free breakfast and lunch to all children 18 years and younger on a grab & go basis. Families can drive or walk-up to the outside of all 9 of our school front offices to grab a weeks worth of breakfast and lunch every Wednesday between the hours of 10:00 AM – 12:00 PM. We will also be delivering to a number of mobile sites on Wednesdays, see below. Adult meals can be purchased for $1 for breakfast and $2 for lunch. No paperwork is required and meals are to be consumed off-site.

p.style: line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 6px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: inherit; text-align: left;
line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 6px 0px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: inherit; text-align: left;
p.span:
10:30 - 11:30 A.M.
Radius Apartments @ Greenfield and Thomas Rd.
Roosevelt East Apartments @ 30th St. and Roosevelt
McDowell East Apartments @ 25th St. and McDowell Rd.
Neighborhood @ Yale and 17th St.
Neighborhood @ Portland and 26th St.
Neighborhood @ Portland and 22nd St.
Neighborhood @ Palm Ln. and 31st St.
Neighborhood @ Coronado Rd. and 18th St.
Neighborhood @ Roosevelt and 33rd St.

p.style: line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 6px 0px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); text-align: left;

div.style: color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: Lato; text-align: left;

span.span: Sabemos que los niños de muchas de nuestras familias comen en las escuelas. Por ello, ofreceremos desayuno y almuerzo gratuitos para llevar a todos los niños de hasta 18 años de edad.

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; padding: 0in; border: 1pt none windowtext;

span.span: Las familias podrán dirigirse en automóvil o a pie a la parte exterior de las oficinas de las nueve escuelas para retirar los desayunos y almuerzos de toda la semana los días miércoles de

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.span: Asimismo, los días miércoles también entregaremos desayunos y almuerzos a varios emplazamientos móviles. Véase a continuación. El desayuno cuesta $1 y el almuerzo $2. No es necesario realizar ningún trámite. Las comidas deben consumirse fuera del lugar.

p.span:
10:30 - 11:30 A.M.
Departamento Radium @ Greenfield and Thomas Rd.
Departamento Roosevelt @ 30th St. and Roosevelt
Departamento McDowell East @ 25th St. and McDowell Rd.
Vecindario @ Yale and 17th St.
Vecindario @ Portland and 26th St.
Vecindario @ Portland and 22nd St.
Vecindario @ Palm Ln. and 31st St.
Vecindario @ Coronado Rd. and 18th St.
Vecindario @ Roosevelt and 33rd St.
Departamento McDowell East @ 25th St. and McDowell Rd.
